Zhuge Liang Medieval characteristic unit, replaces the crossbowman, unlocked in iron smelting, [ICON_Range] is a long-range unit with a range of 1, after researching machinery, it can increase combat power and 1 point [ICON_Range] range. Allows all ranged units to attack twice per turn when unlocked
Wooden cow and horse
Zhuge Liang Medieval characteristic support unit, unlocked in iron smelting, makes units within 2 blocks ignore all terrain debuffs, +10 health recovery
Stone soldiers eight formations

Unlocks the builder's ability to construct the eight formations of stone soldiers, Zhuge Liang's characteristic improvement. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Unlocked in Ironmaking, garrison units get +4 [ICON_Strength] defense, and automatically get 2 rounds of fortification. Enemy units within 1 block have -2 vision
Bow down and die
Bow down and die
Plowing the fields
I like the civilization that builds more granaries and water mills. Hate granaries, civilizations with little water mills.
heavy responsibility
Likes civs that get a lot of greats. I hate a civilization that doesn't seek talent and thirst for talents.

The servants, the servants Guo Youzhi, Fei Yi, Dong Yun, etc., are all good and honest, and they are loyal and pure. A fool thinks that things in the palace are not big or small, and if he consults them well and then implements them, he will surely make up for the shortcomings and benefit a lot.

General Xiang Chong, well-disciplined in nature and good in military affairs, tried to use it in the old days, the first emperor called it Neng, and he was the superintendent based on the popular opinion. Foolishly think that if you know the things in the camp, you will be able to make the formation harmonious and get what you want from the good and the bad.
Has a large number of granaries and water mills
Has a large number of granaries and water mills
Does not have a large number of granaries and water mills
Does not have a large number of granaries and water mills
got a lot of greats
got a lot of greats
Haven't gotten a lot of greats
Haven't gotten a lot of greats
My name is Zhuge Kongming. From today on, show the great plans of the world in front of your eyes.
You are very smart to attack me who is in command of the whole army. ...However, whether we can be defeated is another question.
Now is the perfect opportunity. Let's see Zhuge Kongming's surprise attack plan.
Don't be extravagant in a good year, don't be frugal in an unlucky year, and always have savings to save for later.
(You follow the agenda and farm the fields)
There are few cultivators, but there are many late writers, and the people are like floating clouds, and their hands and feet are restless.
(You have violated the agenda and cultivated the land)
Only fate... Is it beyond my control...
I can no longer beg for thieves in front of the battle, the sky is so long, it's so extreme.
I understand.
...that's not okay.
We have heard of your talent for a long time. Do you want to become a rising dragon in troubled times together with me?
I am not talented, I should do my best
It seems that there is no one here who can entrust our plans. Then, we have no reason to stay here anymore.
okay.
Forgive me for not being able to grant this request.
We will ship salt and iron and Shu brocade. Please enjoy.
We can see your true meaning clearly. I advise you not to do some stupid actions.
If you go down like this, you will be in Longshui Shoal. (condemns you)
We will choose a day to visit.
Alcohol in moderation is better than medicine. Would you like to have a drink together?
Thousands of miles of fertile fields, the land of abundance, we will prepare the best delicacies to entertain you.
My Zhuge Kongming, who is coming?
Then let's act together. Our ingenuity should come in handy along the way.
The food and grass are not available, so we retreat first.
The prosperity of the Han Dynasty can be counted and waited for.
This is the condition of our army. If it can be established, the two parties will be mutually beneficial.
Don't make trouble out of excuses.
If the internal affairs are not stable, we will not welcome you.
We want to take advantage of the way, can we?
Don't complain unless you are an enemy, don't fight unless you are an enemy. Please retreat.
...that's not okay.
Although I am a little worried... But I believe in you, so let's agree with what you said.
My name is Zhuge Kongming. From today on, show the great plans of the world in front of your eyes.
You are very smart to attack me who is in command of the whole army. ...However, whether we can be defeated is another question.
Now is the perfect opportunity. Let's see Zhuge Kongming's surprise attack plan.
A woman who recruits wealth and achieves her chastity, a scholar who admires Xuanxuan and achieves her name, hires scholars with courtesy, and her country is peaceful.
(you followed the agenda it's a big deal)
Yao gave Yi people, Tang recruited Xin, Zhou Gong picked cheap people, all got his people, so that there was peace.
(you're violating the agenda it's less of a burden)
Only fate... Is it beyond my control...
I can no longer beg for thieves in front of the battle, the sky is so long, it's so extreme.
I understand.
...that's not okay.
We have heard of your talent for a long time. Do you want to become a rising dragon in troubled times together with me?

We will ship salt and iron and Shu brocade. Please enjoy.
We can see your true meaning clearly. I advise you not to do some stupid actions.
If you go down like this, you will be in Longshui Shoal. (condemns you)
We will choose a day to visit.

Then let's act together. Our ingenuity should come in handy along the way.
The food and grass are not available, so we retreat first.
The prosperity of the Han Dynasty can be counted and waited for.
Quite enough. Let's retreat temporarily.
Don't make trouble out of excuses.
If the internal affairs are not stable, we will not welcome you.
We want to take advantage of the way, can we?
Don't complain unless you are an enemy, don't fight unless you are an enemy. Please retreat.

Zhuge Liannu is a kind of Liannu made by Zhuge Liang, the prime minister of Shu during the Three Kingdoms period. It was first called Yuanrong Nu, and was called "Zhuge Liannu" by later generations. The Zhuge Liannu can fire ten arrows at a time. It has strong firepower, but its size and weight are too large for individual soldiers to use. It is mainly used to defend cities and camps. Ma Jun, a great inventor in the late Han and Wei Dynasties, wanted to improve it and make it a fifty-arrow crossbow with greater power. However, because the production was very complicated and the arrows used had to be specially made, they were not mass-produced and were later lost. .

Wooden ox and flowing horse are the means of transportation invented by Zhuge Liang, the prime minister of the Shu Han Dynasty during the Three Kingdoms period. They are divided into wooden ox and flowing horse. According to historical records, it was used by Zhuge Liang during the Northern Expedition from the ninth to the twelfth year of Jianxing (231-234). , traveling in groups for thirty li", transporting food for the one hundred thousand army of the Shu Han. However, the true form and appearance are still unknown, and there are different explanations for it.
The merits cover three parts of the country, and it is called the Eight Arrays. The river flows and the stone does not turn, and the regret is lost and swallowed Wu.
Zhuge Liang
Zhongwuhou

Zhuge Liang (181-October 8, 234), courtesy name Kongming, nicknamed Wolong (also known as Fulong), Han nationality, native of Langyayangdu, Xuzhou (now Yinan County, Linyi City, Shandong Province), prime minister of the Shu Han Dynasty during the Three Kingdoms period, an outstanding political figure Home, strategist, diplomat, writer, calligrapher, inventor. In the early years, he went to Jingzhou with his uncle Zhuge Xuan. After Zhuge Xuan died, Zhuge Liang started farming in Longzhong. Later, Liu Bei visited the thatched cottage three times and asked him out to assist Liu Bei in establishing the Shuhan.

After the establishment of the Shu Han Dynasty, Zhuge Liang was granted the title of Prime Minister and Marquis of Wuxiang. Internally, he comforted the people, showed rituals, agreed to official positions, obeyed the power system, was sincere, and imparted justice. Ideal, several Northern Expeditions failed due to various factors. Liu Chan pursued him as Zhongwuhou, and later generations often called him Zhuge Liang as Wuhou and Zhuge Wuhou. The Eastern Jin regime chased him as King Wuxing because of his military ability.

Zhuge Liang, as the prime minister of the Shu Han, appeased the people, obeyed the etiquette system, restrained officials, used power cautiously, was open and honest with others, and was honest and loyal to the country. Those who served the country would be rewarded even if they were their own enemies. Even his cronies will be punished. As long as he sincerely confesses his guilt and submits to the law, no matter how serious the crime is, he will be given leniency. Mistakes will be punished. He handles affairs concisely and practically, can solve problems from the root, does not care about fame but pays attention to reality, and does not do things that are greedy for vanity; finally, everyone in Shu Kingdom fears him but respects him, and uses severe punishments but no one. There are complaints, this is because he is upright and honest, and his admonitions to others are very clear and just.

During the period when Hughes in Hanzhong were persuading farmers, they took advantage of the economic conditions in Hanzhong and adopted a series of effective measures to develop production according to local conditions, so that the military resources of the Northern Expedition were basically resolved on the spot. After Zhuge Liang died, the Shu Han army retreated, and the Wei army was still there. In the Shu camp, "a lot of his books and grains were obtained." This just shows the effect of Zhuge Liang's Hughes persuading farmers to carry out military settlements and farming wars. When the local people live well, more people can be recruited, so that the vast land and sparsely populated Hanzhong can be redeveloped, and gradually achieve a virtuous circle of more people and more food, so that the people can "live in peace and enjoy their work".
Bow down and die

By accumulating science and technology to unlock the city center building, the new city will directly get the building. Substantial savings in productivity costs. Can focus on the development of regional construction. When the science and technology city unlocks a unit, you can also get a unit for free. It is also a strategy to use it for defensive counterattacks or to find opportunities to take the initiative.
Zhuge Liang
Zhongwuhou

Bow down and die

Accumulate experience through battles, and bring the promotion bonus to the whole army, so as to snowball and become more courageous as you fight. Of course, you'll have to make sure the top soldiers don't fall in battle. Otherwise the bonus ability will be lost.
